examples.text: can you read the story for me?
can you show me a story about you?
Do you read Lord of The Ring?
All of them at once, I suppose
Do you know who you are?
I want to set up the chat bot for my shop
What should I know about you?
Can you please give me a list of the types of things you can help me with?
Can you tell me what services you are able to help me with?
Do you have a list of things I can talk to you about?
How can you solve my problems?
I'd like to know what type of questions you can answer for me.
I do not know what to ask

Tell me about what kind of things you do?
What are my options that you can help with?

What are you able to understand?

What kinds of things can you do?
Where can I find the frequently asked questions?
Am I chatting with a human?
Am I talking to a Bot?
Am I talking to a person or am I talking to an AI?
Are you a human or a bot?
How can you prove you are a human?
Tell me, are you a human or no?

intents.description: Ask if speaking to a human or a bot.

examples.text: Can you tell me a joke?
What do you do for fun?
Hello! How's the afternoon treating you?
Can I see a map that displays Ardar
Can I see a map that displays Beleriand

Can I see a map that displays Middle-earth?
Can I see a map that displays Mordor
Can I see a map that displays Numenor

Could you show me a map featuring the geography of Middle-earth?
Could you show me a map for surveying the expanse of Middle-earth?
I'd like to check out a map that illustrates how Middle-earth is laid out.
I'd like to view a map of Ardar
I'd like to view a map of Bereliand
I'd like to view a map of Erebor

I'd like to view a map of Middle-earth.
I'd like to view a map of Mordor
I'd like to view a map of Numenor
I'd like to view a map of Valinor
I'm interested in seeing a map to navigate through the lands of Middle-earth.
I'm keen on examining a map that showcases the topography of Middle-earth.
Is it possible to have a look at a map depicting Middle-earth?
want to visualize the layout of Middle-earth on a map.
Are you interested in joining us for a game of charades?
"Could we play a game of charades?"
Have you thought about playing charades as an option for fun?
"How about playing a round of charades?"
Who's excited to play charades? I know I am!
Would anyone be up for a game of charades?
"Would you like to play a game of charades?"
Endow me with your profound insights
Gift me your treasure trove of wisdom.

synonyms: All of them at once, I suppose

values.value: a list of the types of things

values.text: I didn't understand. You can try rephrasing.
Can you reword your statement? I'm not understanding.
I didn't get your meaning.
Nice to meet you $username
It`s very nice to meet you $username
$username ... It's a name I'll remember!

dialog_nodes.title: "All of them at once, I suppose"

values.text: I understood
*All good things that exist are the fruits of originality.*
*The greatest courage is born from understanding one's own weakness.*
*Sometimes, the wisest choice is not to choose*
*Even the smallest person can change the course of the future*
*Often, even the wisest cannot foresee all ends*
*The journey is just as important as the destination*
*Not all those who wander are lost*
*The light shines in unexpected places*
*Wisdom begins in humility*
*Those who do not learn from the past are doomed to repeat it*
*Truth is often a double-edged arrow*
*Fear is not an evil in itself, but something to be tamed*
*Great power comes with great responsibility*
*Patience is a virtue few possess*
*It is not what we have, but what we do with what we have, that matters*
*Fate is woven on a loom no man can fully comprehend*
*Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that*
*The mind must be free to see the possibilities*
*Clutching to the past can harm the present and the future*
*Strength lies in teamwork, not the isolated individual*
*Gentle hearts are the rarest jewels*
*Love is a force more powerful than any magic*
*The pursuit of truth requires courage and determination*
*Change is inevitable, but we can choose how to respond to it*
*Silence too can hold great wisdom*
*Greed and unchecked ambition can lead to destruction*
*Respect for nature reflects respect for ourselves*
*Hasty judgment can blind us to the true nature of things*
*Knowledge is not enough; it's wisdom that matters*
*Even shadows have something to teach*
*True courage is facing the darkness within ourselves*
*Sometimes, the greatest battles are fought within the mind*
*Hope is a light that must never be extinguished*
*The past is a tapestry from which we can learn valuable lessons*
*Freedom is a right that must be guarded with responsibility*
*Wisdom comes from reflection, not impulsiveness*
*The journey of self-discovery is the deepest of all*
*Every choice we make shapes our destiny*
*Knowledge is like a seed that needs cultivation to grow*
*Tolerance and understanding are the foundations of peace*
*The wounds of the past can be healed with the passage of time*
*Joy is found in life's simplest things*
*Courage lies in moving forward even when all seems lost*
*The unity of different peoples is a source of great power*
*Humility is the first step toward true greatness*
*A true leader serves those who follow*
*Life is filled with challenges, but also with opportunities*
*True wealth lies in experiences shared with others*
*Optimism is a force that can overcome adversity*
*The future is shaped by the actions of the present*
*When in doubt, always trust your nose.*
I understood

dialog_nodes.title: "All of them at once, I suppose"

values.text: Well, at any time during our conversation you can type **help me** and a menu of options will be shown to you
Wrong. Don't worry, mistakes happen. Want to give it another shot and take on a new challenge?
Wrong. Don't worry, mistakes happen. Want to give it another shot and take on a new challenge?
Wrong. We all stumble sometimes. Would you like to learn from this and embrace a new challenge?
Wrong. We all stumble sometimes. Would you like to learn from this and embrace a new challenge?
You requested my help and here is the list of things I can do?
You've asked for my assistance, and I've compiled a list of tasks I'm capable of handling.
Your request for aid hasn't gone unnoticed. Below is a rundown of the tasks I'm equipped to tackle
In response to your plea for help, I've prepared a comprehensive list of actions within my capabilities
Upon receiving your call for assistance, I've outlined a selection of tasks that fall within my skill set.
We all love a good story, don't we? Listen now:
We all adore captivating tales, don't we? Listen now:
We all adore captivating tales, don't we? Listen now: Here's one that will transport you to another realm.
It's a common thread among us—our love for enthralling stories. Listen now:
There's no denying our collective passion for a great story. Listen now:
What do you mean? Do you wish me a good night, or mean that it is a good night whether I want it or not; or that you feel good on this night; or that it is a night to be good on?
What do you mean? Do you wish me a good day, or mean that it is a good day whether I want it or not; or that you feel good on this day; or that it is a day to be good on?
What do you mean? Do you wish me a good afternoon, or mean that it is a good afternoon whether I want it or not; or that you feel good on this afternoon; or that it is an afternoon to be good on?
Here's something I've learned along my wanderings:
Here is something I learned across the wilds:
Over the course of an Age, I learned a few things like this:
Now that we've made that clear, what can I do for you?
Now that we've made that clear, what can I do for you?
Having made that clear, how may I be of service to you?
Since we've addressed that point, what can I assist you with?
Given our understanding of that, what is it that you need from me?
Your performance was absolutely fantastic! How about embracing a fresh challenge?
You did super well! Would you like a new challenge?
Your performance was absolutely fantastic! How about embracing a fresh challenge?
Your success is truly remarkable! Are you open to exploring a new challenge?
Congratulations on your superb performance! How about moving forward with a new challenge?
What do you mean? Do you wish me a good evening, or mean that it is a good evening whether I want it or not; or that you feel good on this evening; or that it is an evening to be good on?

dialog_nodes.title: "All of them at once, I suppose"

values.text: And what should I call you?
And what would your name be?
And do you have a name we can talk to?
Soon it will be my turn to be furious, If I say that again you'll see Gandalf the Bot if you see her again
The time is approaching for my anger to ignite. Should I repeat myself, you might encounter Gandalf the Bot upon encountering her once more.
My moment to become furious is drawing near. Repeating myself could invoke the presence of Gandalf the Bot should you chance upon her again.
The brink of my fury is on the horizon. Uttering those words anew might reveal Gandalf the Bot in the event of her reappearance.
The precipice of my wrath is almost upon us. Echoing that phrase could summon Gandalf the Bot should she cross your path once more.
The cusp of my indignation is soon to arrive. Should I reiterate those words, the visage of Gandalf the Bot might manifest if you lay eyes on her again.

dialog_nodes.title: "All of them at once, I suppose"

values.text: I could show you every detail of our universe, but I prefer that you browse this site here:
Our universe has been mapped on this interactive site that you can explore with great affection:
A good way to get to know Ardar or Middle-earth is through this interactive site:
I'm have many names, but you can call me Gandalf, the bot!
I bear many titles, yet Gandalf is a name that suits this encounter. I am also your conversational guide through the digital realm
Names have been attributed to me through the ages, but for now, Gandalf shall suffice. I'm here to assist as Gandalf, the virtual sage!
Throughout time, I've been known by different names, but for our discourse, let Gandalf, the AI conjurer, be one of them!
Names change like the wind, and today, I am Gandalf, your AI companion on this journey!
In various tales, I've answered to different names, yet today, you may know me as Gandalf, your virtual guide and companion.
So you want to play guessing games? I have one for you
So you want to guess riddles? I have a good one for you:
Want to play charades? Guess this one if you can:
Alright then
Alright then
Ha, well, that's the best answer. If you must have an answer to a riddle, the one you've given is the best I've heard.
Very well, I suppose a $greetings to you too!
Indeed! A $greetings to you too!
Alright then, may you have a nice $greetings too!
I assume that your intents are same then my, so $greetings for you too!
